My name is Tobias Dienlin. I'm a professor for Media Psychology and Methods at the [Department of Communication](https://www.ikmz.uzh.ch/de/department/people/professors/tobias-dienlin.html), University of Zurich.

My research interests include media effects, well-being, privacy, and open science.

On this website, you can find a [blog](/posts) where I occasionally write about research and recent findings. You can also find the current version of my [CV](https://drive.switch.ch/index.php/s/UsTkjl3VqNpECsc){target="_blank"}.

Please always feel free to reach out!
